name: Embedding
description:
Example of embedding a gotm.io game on itch.io.

Learn how to do it in this guide. This game uses the below HTML code:

<html> <body style="display: unset; margin: unset;" > <iframe style="width: 100vw; height: 100vh; border: unset; position: fixed;" src="https://gotm.io/macaroni-studios/block-dasher?forceFullscreen=true" ></iframe> </body> </html>
